summary: A facility that suits all your needs!
descriptionHtml:
Alvors crafting facility
=========================================================================================
The history of the founding

Alvor from Riverwood was being harrased by a trio bandits from the area, when Alvor caught them stealing he asked:\"why are you stealing from me and using my smithing equipments?\" Robiere answered:\"we are using your black smith equipment because we dont have our own and we do need good armour to protect us on the road.\" A few days later Alvors got a crazy idea. He went looking for the bandits and when he found them he proposed his idea. Alvor said:”What would you think of us making a facility for 100’s of people where they can craft their weapons and armour?” Robiere had tot think about it and a few moments later he went back to Alvor and he said that it would be great to do that. And so they began to build the building and before they knew it it was finished! After the facility had opened no bandit or thief ever harrased Alvor or Riverwood. 
=========================================================================================
The facility’s features

The facility consists out of three rooms:

The main hall(where you enter) includes:
- sharpening weels
- workbenches
- anvils
- cooking stands
- smelters
- vendors
- tanning racks
- two dwarven centurion gaurds
- the door to the underforge residence

The enchanting section includes:
- enchantment tables
- bookshelves
- a vendor

The alchemy section uncludes:
- alchemy tables
- a few recipes
- a bed
- a vendor

On the outside there is:
- a choppingblock
- a bedroll
- a little “shrine”
- a weapon rack

under the forge is a small player owned room wich contains:
- a bed
- a sharpening wheel
- a workbench
- a alchemy table
- a map of Skyrim
- a weapon rack
- a chest

*NOTE*
You need the Breezehome key to unlock the door to the underforge residence.
=========================================================================================
